# ignition Provider

The Ignition provider allows you to manage Inductive Automation Ignition resources.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `allow_insecure_tls` (Boolean) Whether to allow insecure TLS connections (e.g., self-signed certs).
- `host` (String) The base URL of the Ignition Gateway (e.g., http://localhost:8088).
- `token` (String, Sensitive) The API token for authentication.
